radiographic_examinations.findings: No white matter lesions or other abnormalities, except for an incidental right frontal mucocele. Spinal T1-weighted sagittal MRI shows no atrophy or other abnormalities throughout the entire spinal cord.
Bilateral hypometabolism in the paramedian frontal, anterior parietal, and temporal lobes.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: FDG-PET hypometabolism suggests diffuse brain damage.
